meanings: promise, (만남의) appointment, engagement, (공적인) pledge, (협정) agreement, promise, make a(n) promise[appointment] (with), (공적으로) pledge

vlive.korean: 뭐 약속 있다 그러지 않았나? Didn't you say you have an appointment? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 남자 때문에 인간관계 X됨 [엑스엑스(XX)] - 하이라이트
vlive.english: Didn't you say you have an appointment?

vlive.korean: 내일 또 공항에 우리 팬님들이 안 나오시길 저랑 약속! And promise that you won't come to the airport tomorrow. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 모두 굿나잇!!
vlive.english: And promise that you won't come to the airport tomorrow.

vlive.korean: 맞아 약속했어! Oh yeah, we made a promise! 듣기 View video ITZY : ITZY(있지) IT'z TOURBOOK EP07
vlive.english: Oh yeah, we made a promise!

vlive.korean: 약속했어요 아까 - 진짜? He promised me. - Really? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 😁 Happy DK & Vernon Day 🤟
'영재야 V LIVE 자주 해줘 약속해!' "Youngjae! Do V LIVE often. Promise us!" 듣기 View video GOT7 : 쉼표방
vlive.english: "Youngjae! Do V LIVE often. Promise us!"

examples.korean: He promised the money to his grandchildren. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 손자들에게 그 돈을 주겠다고 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He promised the money to his grandchildren. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The group has pledged to continue campaigning. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 단체는 캠페인을 계속하겠다고 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The group has pledged to continue campaigning. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The government pledged their support for the plan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부는 그 계획을 지원하기로 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government pledged their support for the plan. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They embraced and promised to keep in touch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 서로 껴안으며 계속 연락하기로 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They embraced and promised to keep in touch. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Japan has pledged $100 million in humanitarian aid. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일본이 인도주의적 지원금으로 1억 달러를 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Japan has pledged $100 million in humanitarian aid. Add to Wordbook
